data.title: Ferdinand Philippe-Louis
data.meta_description:
Circular medal of Ferdinand Philippe-Louis (1810-1842), duke of Orléans. Inscribed on edge "CUIVRE". 

Obverse: Profile bust of Ferdinand Philippe looking to proper  …
data.text:
DescriptionCircular medal of Ferdinand Philippe-Louis (1810-1842), duke of Orléans. Inscribed on edge "CUIVRE".

Obverse: Profile bust of Ferdinand Philippe looking to proper left; inscribed at edge "FERDINAND PHILIPPE LOUIS C.H.DUC D'ORLÉANS" and under bust "BORREL F".

Reverse: Chapel at center; inscribed above "CHAPELLE SAINT FERDINAND/SOUS L'INVOCATION DE NOTRE DAME/DE LA COMPASSION", at proper left "1844", at proper right "BORREL", and in exergue "ÉLEVÉE A LA MÉMOIRE/DE S.A.R.L.F.P.DUC D'ORLÉANS/PRINCE ROYAL/INAUGUREE LE II JUILLET/1843".

InscriptionsInscribed on edge "CUIVRE".

Obverse: Inscribed at edge "FERDINAND PHILIPPE LOUIS C.H.DUC D'ORLÉANS" and under bust "BORREL F".

Reverse: Inscribed above "CHAPELLE SAINT FERDINAND/SOUS L'INVOCATION DE NOTRE DAME/DE LA COMPASSION", at proper left "1844", at proper right "BORREL", and in exergue "ÉLEVÉE A LA MÉMOIRE/DE S.A.R.L.F.P.DUC D'ORLÉANS/PRINCE ROYAL/INAUGUREE LE II JUILLET/1843".
